name: Understanding data structures
description: Ability to understand and work with data structures like arrays, objects, and   key-value pairs
name: Programming languages
description: Familiarity with programming languages like JavaScript, Python, or PHP
name: API design and usage
description: Ability to design and use APIs to send and receive data in JSON format
name: JSON schema validation
description: Understanding of how to validate JSON data against a defined schema
name: Debugging
description: Ability to debug and troubleshoot JSON-related issues
